actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend section 1086 of title 10, United States Code, to delete the provision which excludes persons entitled to hospital insurance benefits under part A of title XVIII of the Social Security Act from eligibility for health benefits under such section.

summary.text: Amends the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services to include otherwise eligible persons who are also entitled to Medicare benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1086 of title 10, United States Code, to delete the provision which excludes persons entitled to hospital insurance benefits under part A of title XVIII of the Social Security Act from eligibility for health benefits under such section.
